quote: The phenomenon of war is its hermaphroditism: the principles of victory and of defeat inhabit the same body and the necessary opponent, enemy, is merely the bed they self-exhaust each other on.
quote_letters: THE PHENOMENON OF WAR IS ITS HERMAPHRODITISM THE PRINCIPLES OF VICTORY AND OF DEFEAT INHABIT THE SAME BODY AND THE NECESSARY OPPONENT ENEMY IS MERELY THE BED THEY SELF-EXHAUST EACH OTHER ON
